briefdescription.para: get an gpio device by gpio device id.

detaileddescription.para:
For how to use gpio device hal refer to Functions in gpio device structure
gpio_id
id of gpio, defined by user
!NULL
pointer to an gpio device structure
NULL
failed to find the gpio device by gpio_id
need to implemented by user in user code

briefdescription.para: DesignWare GPIO object instantiation on HSDK.
